sentences.sContent: On behalf of my country, I apologise.
sentences.sContent_eng: On behalf of my country, I apologise.
sentences.sCn: 我谨以国家名义向世界道歉。

sentences.sContent: But it has been on my mind for so long, and I apologise if it is irrelevant to some readers.
sentences.sContent_eng: But it has been on my mind for so long, and I apologise if it is irrelevant to some readers.
sentences.sCn: 但是它占据我的内心很久了。 如果它与一些读者没有关系，我向你们道歉。

words.tran: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物
